product_description: BEN'S ORIGINAL Ready Rice Jasmine Rice provides a delicious substitute for white rice, brown rice, or wild rice in just 90 seconds. Great as a cooked rice side dish or part of a savory main course, this microwave rice offers 100% authentic Thai rice that is perfect for satisfying your desire for Southeast Asian food. This long grain rice comes in a BPA-free microwaveable rice pouch that eliminates prep and cleanup, making it easier than ever to create a globally-inspired meal. For effortless cooking, microwave this rice for 90 seconds or thoroughly heat it in a skillet before serving. Pair this rice with your favorite Southeast Asian cuisine entrees or serve it plain. This Jasmine rice is vegetarian, very low in sodium and fat, and contains no artificial flavors, no artificial colors, no preservatives, or cholesterol. Ben’s Original is dedicated to creating meals and experiences that offer everyone a seat at the table.

name: Success Boil-in-Bag Rice, White Rice, Quick and Easy Rice Meals, 21-Ounce Box
short_description: DELICIOUS WHITE RICE: You deserve to sit down and savor your meals. Our Success rice bags have you prepared with our precooked and fluffy white rice! Cook quick and tasty rice that any meat lover, vegan, or vegetarian will enjoy.

READY IN 10 MINUTES: This white rice can be cooked in a microwave or on a stove top in 10 minutes! For either option, submerge the rice bag in the specified water quantity and follow the box instructions for perfect rice every time.

CONVENIENT & TASTY: Each precooked rice bag contains no preservatives and is gluten-free, BPA-free, and Non-GMO Project verified. The rice is also MSG-free and Kosher-certified, making this white rice a perfect dish for any family meal.

PERFECT EVERY TIME: Use Success white rice to share your inner chef without the mess. You can use it in casseroles, rice bowls, stir fry, and Mexican or Thai fried rice! Mix this rice with a variety of vegetables and meats to create delicious meals.

SHARE YOUR PASSION: Cook fast, delicious meals without the mess in your kitchen! Give your loved ones tasty dishes that have convenience, taste, texture, and quality all in one bite with each box of Success
product_description: Need a hand with some quick meals and sides for your family? Success presents our Boil-in-Bag Rice, made for fast and easy dishes without the mess! No preservatives are added to this product, and our rice is also non-GMO, gluten-free, and perfect for vegans and vegetarians. Our natural white rice is fluffy, delicious, and MSG-free, making it a wonderful ingredient for a well-balanced diet. You can cook the rice either in the microwave or in a pot on your stovetop, and there are specific instructions on the box for both options. All you need is some water and our rice! For easy microwavable rice, place the bag in the specified amount of water in a microwave-safe dish and cook on high for 10 minutes. To cook on the stove top, place the rice bag in the amount of water the instructions specify and boil uncovered for 10 minutes. Both ways provide you with delicious, light, and fluffy rice that is great for any meal. Serve this quality white rice in dinner casseroles, stir fry, fried rice, and other yummy Thai or Mexican cuisine and dishes. These grains help provide the delicious taste your family needs in a meal with nothing added but convenience! Success knows that your days can get busy, and we understand that you still want to enjoy time with your family. That's why we provide you with our natural, gluten-free rice for fast meals that fit in your day. All of our white and brown rice is grown in the USA. Each box of Success gives you delicious and fast dinners that save you time with cooking and kitchen cleanup. All of our rice is tasty and satisfying, and we only use rice as our one simple ingredient. You and your family deserve to enjoy a satisfying meal together, and Success Boil-in-Bag Rice helps you make quick meals without the mess for you and your loved ones.

name: Takano Koshihikari Rice, Instant Cooked Rice, Microwave Rice, White Rice,Sushi Rice, Microwavable Rice, Premium Quality, Gluten Free Vegan, Niigata Uonuma Product of Japan (Pack of 3)
short_description: High-quality Japanese White Rice : Our product offers premium Koshihikari Japanese short grain white rice microwavable. Ready in minutes for your convenience, providing a seamless cooking experience.

Microwavable Rice: Experience the taste of authentic Japanese cuisine with our microwavable rice. It's simple to prepare and offers a delicious taste. Perfect for those busy days when you crave Asian rice.

Easy-to-Cook Rice Microwave Meal: Our rice microwave product is an easy-to-cook, time-saving solution. It's as simple as heating it in a microwave rice bowl. Your delicious meal will be ready in no time.

Uonuma-grown Koshihikari rice, produced in the pristine fields of Niigata, Japan, embodies the pinnacle of Japanese rice cultivation. Renowned for its exceptional taste, delicate texture, and premium quality, this rice variety is highly sought after by discerning food enthusiasts worldwide.

Hand-selected and meticulously cultivated in the Uonuma region of Niigata, this Koshihikari rice benefits from the region's fertile soil, pure water sources, and ideal climate conditions. The result is a grain that cooks up perfectly fluffy and sticky, with a subtle sweetness that tantalizes the taste buds.

Whether you're preparing sushi, rice bowls, or simply enjoying a bowl of steaming hot rice, Uonuma-grown Koshihikari rice elevates every meal to new heights of culinary excellence. Discover the difference that authenticity and tradition make with each delightful bite!
product_description: Koshihikari rice grown in the Uonuma region is used. The rich land and the Shinano River, the longest river in Japan. And the big difference in temperature during the harvest season. The Uonuma region is perfect for growing Koshihikari rice, ensuring a sweet, delicious flavor. The best Koshihikari is made even tastier with the steam heating and pressurization method.
